data.title: Good Burritos
data.text: This place was convenient to where we were staying at the Comfort Inn nearby.  The burritos were solid.  Plenty of food for the money.

data.title: constitancy is their strong point
data.text: Your always going to get the same flavors every time you go there.  The chicken and steak marinades are great.  The beans and rice so-so.  I hate the fact they steam their tortillas and when I ask if they can heat it up on the flat grill instead I normally am told they cant..and now tired of asking.

data.title: Fast and effecient
data.text: Limited menu, but lots of options from bean varieties, to rice colors. Abundant portion size and good value.

user_location.name: Lafayette, CA San Francisco Bay Area

data.title: good selection of food items
data.text: Good staff. Fresh and tasty food.Good selections of items.Easy access to our hotel (comfort Suites Inn)

data.title: Fresh Mexican food
data.text: Qdoba is a healthy fast food option. It has a great selection of both meat and vegetarian options. They have excellent fresh food!

data.title: A nice lunch
data.text: Stopped in at about 12:15 on a weekday and the line was short, but a steady flow of folks came through.  I had a Taco Salad, with shell (you can skip the shell and it goes in a paper dish).  Nice lettuce and choice of beans, 4 sauces, 5 salsas, then meats including grilled chicken and steak.  Guacamole is now a free addition, as are grilled frejole vegetables.  All quick and efficient.  The ice tea is fresh brewed and ther are both lemon & lime wedges.  Tables are clean with plenty of space inside and on sidewalk.  Just right.

data.title: Always Predictable. Always Awesome!
data.text: We have become regulars at this particular Qdoba and have rarely been disappointed (only when they were training other employees on the job once). From the minute you step into the restaurant you will be greeted with a hearty "hello!" and "what can we get started for you?". The thing that makes this Qdoba stand above other "assembly line" type restaurants is that these guys actually LISTEN to what you are ordering and don't make you feel rushed or seem annoyed when you have special requests. I have also appreciated that there doesn't seem to be a high turn over rate among employees. I see a similar lunch crew month after month and it's obvious they value their work. Additionally, in contrast to, say, a place like Chipotle, Qdoba has free extras. Love guacamole? It's FREE a HUGE whoppin' scoop of it too! Love extra fajita veggies? Free, and the extra scoop goes on with a smile. Need your queso on the side? No problem! and "would you like to try our new chipotle queso while you're here?" This crew is simply awesome and my husband and I have thoroughly enjoyed our lunch dates here. For family dinners out it has easily become our default. It helps that they also now have a reward program for things like free entrees and free chips and salsa. There is simply no better Mexican Grille in town.

data.title: My favorite fast food
data.text: Quick and gracious service, good food quality, reasonably priced, conveniently located.  I get take out here to enjoy in my hotel room after a long work day.
